title: Sash, 1900–69
medium:
Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: tied resist patterning in weft (ikat) on plain weave
description: Long sash (or turban) with a border at each end containing bands of geometric patterns in gold and silver on a red background. The field contains geometric bands in gold broken by narrow bands of ivory, orange, yellow, and green on a red background. Fine warp fringe about 10cm (4in) long.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sash, 1900–69.Medium: silk, metallic threads
Technique: tied resist patterning in weft (ikat) on plain weave. Gift of Alan L. Wolfe. 1969-50-7.
